The encode() method handles the encoding process and checks for EOF. If the EOF handling is incorrect, it could lead to issues in the output, which might affect the test results.

The readResults() method processes the results of the encoding. While it is less likely to be the direct cause of the test failure, any issues in how it handles the buffer could contribute to unexpected results.
